SIT's Integrated Work Study Programme (IWSP) is the signature of an SIT degree. For the past decade, the IWSP has been a trailblazer, empowering SITizens to integrate theory and practice, and develop deep specialist skills in their chosen field.

Through training, robust mentorship, and strong industry support, SIT's IWSP has cultivated a new generation of highly sought-after professionals who are industry-ready and equipped to thrive in today's dynamic world of work.
